tasks.task: Plant tomatoes indoors and create strong root systems
subtasks: Prepare containers (red solo cups) for tomato seeds
Fill containers halfway with seed starting mix
Plant multiple seeds per container for better germination
Cover seeds with vermiculite for moisture and fungus prevention
Top up containers as tomatoes grow, burying stems to encourage root growth
Water using a heat mat to aid germination
Use plastic dome or bag to maintain humidity until germination
Place under grow lights after sprouting to ensure strong plant development

tasks.task: Start other vegetables and flowers indoors
subtasks: Select seven different varieties, including tomatoes, cherry tomatoes, beefsteaks, and ground cherries
Plant seeds in appropriate containers (some may have specific needs)
Use seed starting mix, moistening with boiling water for sterilization
Monitor and care for all indoor starts, providing necessary light and heat
